name: Creative Continents
description:
Creative Continents, "Early Access"

gives you access to two modes.
Creation Mode:
Raise your lands from the Sea, terraform your continent exactly how you would like it with over 20 different biomes complete with varying foliage, and visual styles.
Raise Mountains, valleys, meadows and more. And when the lands roll out just right. Save them to your Continent.

Travel Mode:
Now you can visit your custom Continent You pull from the sea in First/Third Person. You will be able to explore and build right away.
But as the Early access expands we plan on adding all sorts of play modes you will be able to employee.

Creative Continents wants you to Shape the Worlds you play in.
